entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Snow level rising to 1400 metres in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 10. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
